summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Lane Street, from Thirty-first Avenue South to Thirty-second Avenue South, King Street, from Thirty-first Avenue South to Thirty-second Avenue South; Thirty-first Avenue South, from Jackson Street to Dearborn Street; and Thirty-second Avenue South, from King Street to Lane Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 744 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
